name: Peacock

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
text: The peacock has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: The peacock has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the peacock's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Beak
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

description: Source: Baldur's Gate: Descent Into Avernus p. 195
